column3: Latest;Kampong Thom Province: A riding a motorbike was struck by lightning
column4: which caused him to fall and die at 4:15 pm on September 9 in Neak Ta forest in Chhouk Romdol village
column6: Santuk district.------The victim was named as 55-year-old Put So
column7: a farmer living in Choam Thna village
